page.title: 14DIPTFORD HAPPENINGS
page.content: Beating the Bounds is run every nine years in aid of Cancer Relief and St. Mary's Church Diptford. It used to be held so people would know where the { boundary stones were. People used to take other younger people, so as the generations went by, somebody would know where the boudary was. At the { {Fun} evening there are lots of games for children and adults. We have the fun evening at Diptford playing fields. There are hotdogs to buy, we have a sing song and to finish off the evening there are some fireworks.Each year a Horticultural {show}is held in a huge marquee where Flowers, Vegetables, cakes and crafts are on display for all to see. Outside stalls and games are organised. Everyone enjoys the Dog Show. In the evening the villagers come to the Barn{Dance} to end the happy day.
